products.name: asics gel nimbus 24
products.description: Rubber outsole with a special formulation to resist abrasion (wear), located in critical areas, such as the heel. Asics Lite: Extremely light and resistant rubber with high durability.

products.name: mizuno wave prophecy 11
products.description: With one of the most beautiful designs at the moment, the Wave Prophecy 11S sneakers are perfect for you who prioritize quality and style at your events. The men's sneaker has an upper (upper part of the shoe) made of synthetic and textile material.

products.name: nike revolution 6
products.description: Versatile and ultra comfortable for the gym, light running workouts and everyday use. Want a comfortable Nike sneaker with the best cost benefit? Revolution 6 is for you dynamic and modern. Its upper (upper part of the shoe) features lightness, breathability, maintains freshness and flexibility of movement.

products.name: nike downshifter 11
products.description: From a leisurely walk to fitness training and light running make the Nike Downshifter 11 Shoes a great choice. Its upper (the upper part of the shoe) is made of light and soft textile for a comfortable and flexible fit.

products.name: asics gel nagoya 4
products.description: The perfect men's sneaker to accompany you when exercising outdoors, at the gym and even for everyday tasks is the Gel-Nagoya 4. It has the Gel Cushioning System technology that promotes the absorption of impacts.

products.name: adidas runfalcon
products.description: The upper part of the pants can be adjusted in mesh and light, ensures greater lace to the feet, providing greater breathability.
